<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MobileMessageUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>MobileMessageUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var MobileMessageUtil = Class.create();
MobileMessageUtil.addSecurityErrorForTable = function(tableName) { gs.warn("Cannot read table " + tableName); var errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Security constraints prevent access to table"); gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage); };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-25 04:53:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>470ce0c177510110b011bde54b5a9942</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MobileMessageUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_470ce0c177510110b011bde54b5a9942</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-25 05:10:12</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>281</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
